Package app.security.util.tokenUtil

Class JwtUtil

java.lang.Object
app.security.util.tokenUtil.JwtUtil
public abstract class JwtUtil
extends java.lang.Object
Provides static methods for creating and attaching JWT tokens.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static JwtKeyFactory jwtKeyFactory
    Factory for producing JWT keys
    private static java.security.Key KEY
    Hmac SHA key, parsed from the key, produce by the JwtKeyFactory
    private static int PERIOD
    Expires period of the JWT cookie

    Adds refresh token cookie to the response
    static User extract​(java.lang.String jwt)
    Parses User object with id and name from the JWT
    static java.lang.String parse​(User user)
    Creates the JWT from the user object.

  • Method Details

    • parse

      public static java.lang.String parse​(User user)
      Creates the JWT from the user object. Includes id and name of the user.
      Parameters:
      user - target to parse
      Returns:
      parsed JWT

    • extract

      public static User extract​(java.lang.String jwt) throws io.jsonwebtoken.security.SignatureException, io.jsonwebtoken.MalformedJwtException
      Parses User object with id and name from the JWT
      Parameters:
      jwt - input JWT
      Returns:
      parsed user
      Throws:
      io.jsonwebtoken.security.SignatureException - if signature is invalid
      io.jsonwebtoken.MalformedJwtException - if JWT is broken

    • attach

      public static void attach​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, User user)
      Adds refresh token cookie to the response
      Parameters:
      response - target to add cookie
      user - object to include into JWT
